I have fixed the concurrentmodificationexception under 70773 as I was able to 
reproduce it under that bug report.  I will update 70773 when a dev build 
becomes available with the fix in.  Please can you try it and verify it solves 
your case here too.  My fix is a variant of what you have proposed in this 
report.

thanks
Andy.
